DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : examine effect hatha yoga treatment eat disorder . Methods : Participants : patient DSM-IV Anorexia Nervosa , Bulimia Nervosa Eating Disorders Not Otherwise Specified invite participate study . Exclusion criterion age 18 , serious medical complication , psychosis increase risk suicide . Design : randomize control single-blinded trial . Intervention : 2 x 90 min weekly group session 12 week hatha yoga . Main outcome measure : reduction Eating Disorders Examination score . Secondary outcome measure : reduction body dissatisfaction , depression anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: For last year , yoga become popular `` body-mind '' form exercise western country ( Daubenmier , 2005 ) . Yoga show good effect increase muscle strength , flexibility stability , addition study find reduced stress level , improve mood breathing ( Astin et al. , 2003 ; Gimbel , 1998b ; Granath et al. , 2006 ; Lavey et al. , 2005 ; Manjunatha et al. , 2005b ; Netz & Lidor , 2003a ; Telles & Naveen , 1997b ; Yadav et al. , 2005b ) . Previous research show tendency person practice yoga improve body awareness body sensitivity , reduction body dissatisfaction ( Daubenmier , 2005 ) . In addition , two study examine yoga treatment binge eat disorder ( Daubenmier , 2005 ; Gimbel , 1998a ) . Results show reduction number binge eat episode intervention group compare control group . No available study examine effect yoga treatment eat disorder type Anorexia Nervosa Bulimia Nervosa .
DOC.criteria: age 18 DSMIV Anorexia nervosa , Bulimia nervosa Eating disorder otherwise specify serious medical complication psychosis suicidal behavior
